Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays at Granville due to an earlier medical emergency. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delays at Granville due to an earlier medical emergency.

Also, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Howard and Wilson.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Western, 83rd, Kedzie, due to street blockage near 79th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Western, 83rd, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 92nd/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted  via 92nd, Houston, 91st, and Brandon over regular route due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted  via 92nd, Houston, 91st, and Brandon over regular route due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Torrence
ShortDescription: Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 104th, Muskegon and 106th: due to, street blockage near 106th/Torrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 104th, Muskegon and 106th: due to, street blockage near 106th/Torrence.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
